title: Timestamps option in League won't stay on.
body: Not sure if this is right place to post but I have to manually turn on timestamps in the chat menu option every game. All my friends have this option on permanently but I'm not sure why mine isn't staying on.

replies.body:
Typically those settings should be saving on our servers so that you don't have to update the settings every time you launch the game. There might be something in your config files that aren't working quite right which is stopping them from being saved. Let's try resetting those config files to see if that gets it saving right again.

- Log into the game client
- Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
- Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
- Go into a custom game and verify that settings have saved properly. 
- Leave game to sync settings
